game.name: Active Neurons 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Active Neurons 2 is a puzzle game in which you have to discover 12 greatest inventions of humanity and reflect on the power of human thought
game.shortDescriptionEn: Active Neurons 2 is a puzzle game in which you have to discover 12 greatest inventions of humanity and reflect on the power of human thought

reviewHighlights.text: I really enjoy this game it's pretty fun. I would suggest waiting for it to go on sale if you are looking to get this game.
Someone recommended the game to me, and when I tried it, I loved it!
